quiz_data.content: Here is your quiz on Current Affairs

questions.question_text: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations (2025)?
questions.explanation: Antonio Guterres has been serving as the Secretary-General of the United Nations since January 1, 2017.

questions.question_text: Which country recently hosted the G20 Summit in 2024?
questions.explanation: Brazil hosted the G20 Summit in 2024 following India's presidency in 2023.
questions.hint: This South American country is famous for the Amazon rainforest.

questions.question_text: Who won the 2024 Nobel Peace Prize?
questions.explanation: Narges Mohammadi, an Iranian human rights activist, was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2024.
questions.hint: She is a women's rights activist from Iran.

questions.question_text: Which country recently became the 31st member of NATO in 2023?
questions.explanation: Finland officially became the 31st member of NATO in April 2023.
questions.hint: This country shares a long border with Russia.

questions.question_text: Which team won the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023?
questions.explanation: Australia defeated India in the final to win the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023.
questions.hint: This team has won the most number of World Cups in cricket.

questions.question_text: Who is the current Prime Minister of the United Kingdom (2025)?
questions.explanation: Keir Starmer became the Prime Minister of the UK in 2024 after the Labour Party's victory in the general election.
questions.hint: He is the leader of the Labour Party.

questions.question_text: Which country recently launched the Chang'e-6 lunar mission in 2024?
questions.explanation: China launched the Chang'e-6 lunar mission in 2024, aiming to collect samples from the far side of the moon.
questions.hint: This country has an ambitious space program with missions named after a Moon goddess.

questions.question_text: COP29, the UN Climate Change Conference in 2024, was hosted by which country?
questions.explanation: COP29 was hosted by Azerbaijan in November 2024.
questions.hint: This country is located in the Caucasus region.

questions.question_text: Who is the current President of the United States (2025)?
questions.explanation: Joe Biden is serving as the President of the United States as of 2025.
questions.hint: He is the 46th President of the US.

questions.question_text: Which country hosted the 2024 Summer Olympics?
questions.explanation: The 2024 Summer Olympics were held in Paris, France.
